pages.title: All-Inclusive Bali Wedding Packages - Wedding Planners

seo.title: All-Inclusive Bali Wedding Packages - Wedding Planners
seo.description:
Our Bali wedding planners have over 30 years experience curating beautiful 
all-inclusive wedding packages in Bali’s most breathtaking wedding venues.

children.text: NOW TAKING 2027 BOOKINGS  |  CHAT WITH ONE OF OUR BALI WEDDING PLANNERS TODAY | Contact Us >
Beautifully curated, high-quality Bali wedding packages and Bali wedding planning, in Bali’s most breathtaking wedding venues.

We live and breathe weddings, and our planners are physically here living and breathing Bali life. Exactly where you need your A-team to be to help you plan your dream Bali Wedding. With over 40 years combined experience in weddings, events and travel, our team have incredible relationships with Bali’s finest suppliers, giving you the option of bespoke planning services, or an all inclusive Bali wedding package.

Transparent, flexible detailed Bali wedding packages for Bali’s best wedding venues. Wedding packages take the stress out of booking your wedding so you know exactly what you’re getting and how much it costs.
EXPLORE PACKAGES →

Your wedding planner is your team leader, your boots on the ground, your organisational ninja and vour emotional support all in one. Bali.Love offers a variety different Bali wedding planning services.
EXPLORE PLANNING →
Our team has spent years building solid relationships with Bali’s most stunning wedding venues. Let us take care of everything, and you can focus on more important things, like dress shopping…
EXPLORE VENUES →

With Bali.Love wedding planning, you get your own dedicated Bali wedding planner to take care of the important tasks and to guide you through the process, plus the benefit of the entire extended planning and operational team.
So, take a big breath in, and let it all go – it’s time to stop stressing, and start planning.
We’re glad you asked!

Planning a destination wedding can feel like it involves a million different tasks and answering questions you’ve never considered before, and it easily becomes overwhelming. But with the right support, the process becomes clear.

Think about it – most likely, the maximum number of weddings you’ve ever planned hovers somewhere in the realm of zero. Contrast that with the Bali.Love planning team whose decades of experience equates to thousands of weddings planned. We’ve got this!
Get the benefit of experience on your side.

Aside from saving your sanity, there’s a strong practical reason to engage a planner – in any given wedding, there are dozens of suppliers who must be booked and coordinated for everything to go smoothly. While this is a piece of cake to a planner who knows all the suppliers individually, for a couple in another country it’s hard to know when vou need to book kev suppliers (and there’s nothing worse than suddenly realising all the good photographers are alreadv booked out for vour wedding date). Plus. simply sending off deposits overseas and hoping for the best generally isn’t a recipe for a stress-free planning experience!

We cannot express how much gratitude we have for the Bali Love team, for delivering the most magical day of our lives… If you are considering a destination wedding in Bali, then Bali Love are your team! We are still in are of how seamless and perfect our day was…they worked tirelessly to bring to life every single detail of our vision in the most spectacular ways. They are the most warm and accommodating team who truly took all the stress out of the process, from concept to execution. Their experience, expertise and network of the very best suppliers meant that we were able to have the wedding day of our dreams! Thank you Bali Love, you are the very best at what you do and we are eternally grateful.
– PENELOPE AND DAVID
Because there’s nothing more stressful than not knowing exactly what you’re getting, or how much it’ll cost.
We’re in this because we love helping people, and we love being a part of such important celebrations. We give 110% to our clients because we couldn’t work any other wav.
Communication is everything. When you’re planning a huge life event, in another country, you need prompt answers to your question.

We get it. You have a question, but you’re scared to ask for fear you’ll get stuck in a long awkward sales process. We’re not into that. In fact, we only do 100 Bali weddings a year so we can maintain a super high standard.

Whether you’re looking for Bali’s newest hip destination wedding venue on the top of every influencer’s list (that’s Bali Beach Glamping by the way!), a luxury private villa, or a romantic beachfront garden complete with infinity pool and antique Indonesian statues, you’ll find it here.
Browse our venue listings, or explore our all-inclusive Bali Wedding Packages and let us do all the hard work for you.

A brand new luxury glamping resort is coming to Bali's 5* Nusa Dua South Coast. Sharing the same stunning white sand beaches and tropical turquoise ocean as neighbouring world class resorts The Mulia, Ritz-Carlton and St Regis, Glamp Nusa brings an affordable luxury glamping experience to the most expensive and exclusive destination in Bali. Glamp Nusa offers all-inclusive and exclusive wedding packages for up to 150 guests (seated reception), with accommodation to sleep up to 90 of your guests in the resort's 40 beautifully designed tents with private ensuite bathrooms. Enjoy the stunning clifftop restaurant with full bar and catering packages, infinity pool and a sprawling event lawn with space for garden parties, dance parties, and recovery BBQ brunches. All to the backdrop of a panoramic ocean view. You'll have the resort all to yourself for your wedding, to enjoy with only your nearest and dearest. With no other guests to crash your party, Glamp Nusa is the ultimate VIP resort.

Bali Beach Glamping is an amazing beachfront resort that specialises in hosting weddings and other events. The beachfront spans 90meters of uninterrupted private beach. Located just 25 minutes north of Canggu. Host up to 300 guests on the large 1000sqm wedding lawn ideal for weddings, parties, yoga sessions and more. The infinity pool looks out on the Indian Ocean. It’s west facing position makes it the ideal location for taking in a romantic sunset. Other features include a beach club, restaurant and spa. Food, beverage and spa services are offered at reasonable prices to resident guests and visitors. With 40 air-conditioned luxury tents they are able to accommodate 90 guests in total. All luxury tents have ensuite bathrooms. You can book the whole resort exclusively or hire the wedding venue only – the choices are endless and are completely yours to make!

Villa Vedas is the ultimate luxury private villa. Set on 45 metres of beachfront, the villa has been architect-design with no expense spared or detail forgotten. Relax and unwind before your wedding in total luxury, swim in the infinity pool or sky plunge pool, walk along the beach or order a massage. Your wedding day will be the best party you’ll ever throw at Villa Vedas with a 2am curfew! Congratulations, you’ve just found Bali’s best value 5-star private villa wedding. Surrounded by gorgeous rice paddies and villages, the location north of Tanah Lot is off the beaten track and away from noise and crowding of Bali's main areas, but it's just an easy 20-minute drive from Canggu's bars, shops, restaurants, spas and beach clubs.

Sitting on one of the highest points on Uluwatu's famous cliffs, The Edge lives up to its name - the views have to be seen to be believed. Weddings held at The Edge have the option of using different spaces outside different villas depending on the size of the wedding, so it's a good idea to chat to us about your needs and plans so we can work out the best option for you. Whatever you choose, your wedding at The Edge will be the experience of a lifetime that you and your guests will be reminiscing about for years.
Nobody sings our praises quite like our happy couples. Go check out any Bali Wedding Facebook or community forums online and ask about us. We’ll let them speak for us.

At Bali.Love, what you see is what you get. There’s nothing worse than getting a shock at the price right at the very end. In Bali, it’s normal for you to see one price but then be charged another higher price with added taxes and service charges. We promise that all our advertised prices include all applicable fees and charges, so there are no nasty surprises.

As an Australian-owned company, Bali. Love is bound by Australian Consumer Law. Consumer Law is much stronger in Australia than in other parts of the world, so it’s important to make sure that vou’re booking through a reputable companv that gives vou the maximum consumer protection. We work reallv hard to maintain exceptional relationships and we get industry rates for everything. We love to make sure our clients are getting the best deal.
Contact us directly at…
EMAIL: HELLO@BALI.LOVE
AUSTRALIAN ADDRESS5 Rutland St,Geelong VIC 3220
BALI OFFICE ADDRESSJ1. Pratama, Benoa, Kec. KutaSel., Kabupaten Badung,Bali 80361, Indonesia
BALI’S BEST WEDDING PLANNERS, 25+ YEARS COMBINED EXPERIENCE, DIRECT RELATIONSHIPS WITH BALI’S MOST PREMIUM VENUES, CATERERS, PHOTOGRAPHERS & SUPPLIERS.
ABOUT USBLOGCONTACT USTERMS & CONDITIONSPRIVACY POLICY CAREER

Get in touch today

pages.title: We Make Planning Your Bali Wedding Simple — Bali.Love

seo.title: We Make Planning Your Bali Wedding Simple — Bali.Love
seo.description:
Plan your dream Bali wedding with your own dedicated Bali Wedding Planner, 
our team have 30+ years experience delivering epic weddings in Bali.

children.text: NOW TAKING 2027 BOOKINGS  |  CHAT WITH ONE OF OUR BALI WEDDING PLANNERS TODAY | Contact Us >

With Bali.Love wedding planning, you get your own dedicated Bali wedding planner to take care of the important tasks and to guide you through the process, plus the benefit of the entire extended planning and operational team.
So, take a big breath in, and let it all go – it’s time to stop stressing, and start planning.
We’re glad you asked!

Planning a destination wedding can feel like it involves a million different tasks and answering questions you’ve never considered before, and it easily becomes overwhelming. But with the right support, the process becomes clear.

Think about it – most likely, the maximum number of weddings you’ve ever planned hovers somewhere in the realm of zero. Contrast that with the Bali.Love planning team whose decades of experience equates to thousands of weddings planned. We’ve got this!
Get the benefit of experience on your side.

Aside from saving your sanity, there’s a strong practical reason to engage a planner – in any given wedding, there are dozens of suppliers who must be booked and coordinated for everything to go smoothly. While this is a piece of cake to a planner who knows all the suppliers individually, for a couple in another country it’s hard to know when vou need to book kev suppliers (and there’s nothing worse than suddenly realising all the good photographers are alreadv booked out for vour wedding date). Plus. simply sending off deposits overseas and hoping for the best generally isn’t a recipe for a stress-free planning experience!

Your planner is your go-to person during the planning process, your eyes and ears on the ground in Bali, your sounding board for ideas, and guide to everything from choosing a makeup artist to timing of speeches. As you organise your wedding step by step, vour planner fills you in on key suppliers that need to be booked, and decisions that need to be made along the way. Then closer to the day, your wedding planner creates your runsheet, organises operational meetings with evervone (from the caterers to the entertainment) and runs your rehearsal once you arrive in Bali. And this is all before you get to the actual wedding day!

On the dav. vour wedding team is made up of vour planner, the bride and groom’s assistants. the usher, and the driver. The bride and groom each have an assistant on the day to help with getting ready, making sure everyone has what they need, organising any last minute things that arise (there’s alwavs something that comes up at the eleventh hour! and helping to keep vou calm and relaxed so vou can enjov the day. The usher welcomes the guests and guides everyone to the right places at the right time. and the driver will pick vou up from vour accommodation and is on standby just in case.

Through it all, your planner is there behind the scenes working hard to create an effortless flow of events. Whether she’s making sure the MC knows what to do, directing the D] where to set up, checking that the florist has the flowers completed on time, or working with the nannies to ensure the kids have everything they need, your planner is the glue that binds the wedding together – your secret weapon, close confidant and ninja problem solver all in one.
THE BOSS, OUR FOUNDER

Tom is our straight-talking, fast-talking and brilliant Boss. He might look fancy but he is super grounded… tells bad Dad jokes, and his favourite job ever as a younger person was running the composting toilets at a huge music festival in Australia – literally just organising how best to manage people’s err… sh*t. So many good shit stories apparently…

But in all seriousness, he ran a hugely successful cafe, catering business and wedding business in Melbourne for many years. And now he’s choosing to grow a new wedding company in Bali, so he can escape Melbourne winter every now and then and come for “team meetings” on the beach.
He can’t live without: coffee

His favourite moment of a wedding: The big crescendo at the end when the celebrant announces the couple are now officially married, and there’s this huge emotional release after all the quietness and seriousness of the ceremony, and everyone can just cheer, yell and cry.
Fave food: Cornflakes and honey
SENIOR WEDDING PLANNER

Talitha left her 9-to-5 in Australia’s pharmaceutical industry over 8 years ago to travel the world. After a pitstop in Bali, a chance meeting with a wedding planner, and the courage to say yes, she redirected her epic Project Management skills to organising weddings and the rest is history.

With the attention to detail you’d expect from a seasoned Project Manager, Talitha has every tiny detail covered, twice. And when a couple came to her after their wedding plans fell through, she turned around an entire wedding for 50 guests in two weeks. Imagine what she can do for you in a year…
SENIOR WEDDING PLANNER

Meet Jo, our Wedding Planner that has been more than 15 years in the hospitality industry. She's passionate about music, loves meeting with new people and enjoys working in events; and the wedding world is the amazing place to get all. In fact, before diving into this industry, she was a radio announcer! Jo will be happy to give you tips for your playlist.
He can’t live without: coffee and her rescued dogs.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: When the bride appears, she loves to look at the groom, the family, and also the guests' expressions when they see the bride for the first time.
Fave food: Vegemite, cheese, and Indonesian food.
SENIOR WEDDING PLANNER
Selina is a Bali wedding aficionado with over 12 years of experience on the island, dedicated to curating the perfect day for every couple.

As a Senior Wedding Planner and Special Projects Lead, her previous life in retail interior fit-out project management  ensures precision and organisation in every detail. When she's in Bali, and not at a wedding, you'll find her enjoying leisurely brunches, exploring the best culinary adventures, tranquil yoga sessions, or chasing after her spirited two-year-old son.
WEDDING PLANNER

Abby is a Planning Specialist with over 13 years of experience working in the event and wedding industry. Starting off as a florist and stylist for some of London's luxury brands Abby's creative flare stemmed and bloomed her career in the Wedding Industry. Owning an Events Management degree and Wedding Planning Diploma, the planning, and logistics of any wedding Abby is involved with are sure to be organised with the finest attention to detail.After panning and styling weddings for venues all over the UK Abby decided to open her wedding wings and relocate to Bali Indonesia to work her magic on the tropical island.
He can’t live without: Nature, music, and her pug Milo.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: When the final details & touches are completed to perfection. Watching the reactions of the couple's faces light up from the transformation fills her with joy!
Fave food: All things veggie & a Sunday roast!.. She is English after all!
OUR VERY OWN BALI LOVE STORY – HUSBAND AND WIFE TEAM – WEDDING PLANNING SPECIALIST ATHA & ACCOUNTS LEAD MARIA

ATHA – With a career dedicated to events, Atha has worked with many of Bali’s venues, food & beverage businesses, and private villa properties. Early in his career at a private villa rental, Atha quickly impressed Wedding Organisers liaising with him for wedding bookings, and soon enough he was poached by one of Bali’s biggest wedding planning companies. We are very very grateful to have his experience on the team

MARIA – Maria comes to Bali Love after years spent working as a Personal Assistant to a children’s clothing brand entrepreneur. She absolutely loves being a Personal Assistant, and becoming that one person that you can trust with anything. With her first class admin skills, she is our team’s Accounting Guru.
PLANNING SPECIALIST
Bagus worked for an international corporate events business for 10 years, and saw them grow from less than 5 employees to hundreds! He is an absolute pro, there is nothing we can’t throw at him.

He loves working at Bali Love because our team has such big heart. He says, “It’s the best feeling in the world to see how happy our couples are on their wedding day. After all the hard work, making people happy is the biggest reward.”
He can’t live without: his family, and helping his community in Lombok where he is from.
His favourite moment of a wedding: when I see the bride and groom smile, so I know we’ve done our job well.
Fave food: everything his wife cooks!
PLANNING SPECIALIST

She’s a natural wedding planner, super organised, an events pro. And her personal passion in life is philosophy, having deep conversations with friends, and reading books about different perspectives on life, searching for life’s great purpose, (or is there a purpose??). Ask Yunita and get stuck into a two hour conversation about it, it’ll be fun! Her deep thinking, listening and heart feeling sensibility means she knows how important all the tiniest of details are for your perfect day.
She can’t live without: Books, and her dog Kuppa!
Her favourite moment of a wedding: Watching the day roll out perfectly, the crescendo of over a year of planning, seeing it become real – “it’s magic”.
Fave food: Nasi goreng (fried rice) with egg – but has to be street style. Not a restaurant nasi goreng… no thanks.
PLANNING SPECIALIST

Dewi is a Planning Specialist with 11 years of experience working in the event and wedding industry. She started as a Wedding Administration staff when she was still studying in university, continuing working as F&B Secretary, and Wedding Coordinator in the hotel, and the last 5 years working alongside the wedding planning team as Vendor Liaison in one of the wedding companies. She uses her positive attitude and tireless energy to encourage others to succeed.
He can’t live without: her sons (Deo & Yoki), her husband, mobile phone, and laptop.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: When the bride & bridesmaid look happy!
Fave food: Western food; especially pasta, pizza, steak. Japanese food. Korean food. She loves food!
ADMIN NINJA

Dewita has worked for 15 years as a personal assistant and Villa Manager. She started to work as a freelancer at weekends to support wedding planning companies when they hire extra staff for wedding days, and she realised that it was the dream job for her. Welcome to the team Dewita, now live out your dream as a full time Wedding Planner – go go!
She can’t live without: relaxing “me time”, travelling and baking.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: watching the bride walk down the aisle with their father – she cries every time.
Fave food: Bakso
PLANNING TEAM

Bram organised events at University and has been working in events ever since he graduated. He is a naturally confident people person, an essential member of your wedding team on the big day, making sure all vendors (and guests!) are where they are meant to be.
He was new to the wedding world when he joined the team, and he never expected it would be more fun than working at nightlife events for an alcohol brand, but he is absolutely loving it!
He can’t live without: Playing guitar, watching movies & TV. He just finished watching You on Netflix and apparently you HAVE to watch it.

His fave moment of a wedding: As a newbie to the world of weddings when he joined the Bali Love team, he absolutely loved the Mother-of-the-bride speech at his first Bali Love wedding. It made him so emotional, which he didn’t expect at all.
Fave food: nasi goreng with omelette
ADMIN SPECIALIST

Diah is an Admin Specialist, and enjoys using her product management skill to contribute to the catalogue at Bali.Love. Having experienced helping a friend's wedding company, she is happy to be part of the wedding industry. Besides being responsible for the catalogue, she is also arranging the tour. So much fun!
He can’t live without: EAT
Her favourite moment of a wedding: Wedding vows is the romantic moment!
Fave food: Meat & meat processed product - meat ball, steak, sausage, hamburger.
PLANNING TEAM

Before life at Bali Love, Ary worked in live music events, organising rock music events for Malboro and other brands, in venues all over Bali. Fun fact – He was also a vocalist in a hardcore band when he was younger! Ask Ary for local rock band recommendations if you want a wedding band that’s a little more punk, less pop…

He can’t live without: travelling. “My favourite trip ever was to this tiny island south of Lombok, I don’t remember the name of it (we don’t believe him for a minute!), but only groups of 5 people are allowed to go there, and it’s amazing.”
His favourite moment of a wedding: when the couple exchange their rings and kiss. It’s so romantic.
Fave food: nasi goreng or any local food
BALI LOVE WEDDING PLANNING – $4,700 AUD
Dedicated Wedding Planner – Your central point of contact.

Unlimited Wedding Planning Hours – Planning calls, arranging quotes, confirmingavailability, booking vendors, liaising with the venue and all vendors, pre-weddingoperational meetings, managing rehearsal, on the day coordination, bump in and bump out,amazing support and guidance and all-round ninja-ing!

Bride’s Assistant & Groom’s Assistant – Help with getting ready (from steaming clothing tofinding a safety pin), assisting during photos, ensuring the bride and groom have food anddrinks, and generally being on hand to help and make the bride and groom feel like royalty.
Team – To welcome guests and provide directions at key times throughout the wedding.
Driver/Runner – On hand in case anything needs to be picked up last minute on the day.
Cash back if you take out wedding insurance policy. Conditions Apply.
Sounds Exciting! We’d love to hear about it.
There are no hours! So you can’t go over.

You’ll get the best available planner price on all bookings. This is usually a lower price than what you’ll get directly. Our suppliers get many bookings from us each year – so we’ll have much better bargaining power than you would have on your own.
Yes! Absolutely. Send us your details and we’ll arrange a time.
No. You have plenty of flexibility to make changes after you have booked.
We’ll invoice you and you can pay by credit card or direct into the bank account.
BALI’S BEST WEDDING PLANNERS, 25+ YEARS COMBINED EXPERIENCE, DIRECT RELATIONSHIPS WITH BALI’S MOST PREMIUM VENUES, CATERERS, PHOTOGRAPHERS & SUPPLIERS.
ABOUT USBLOGCONTACT USTERMS & CONDITIONSPRIVACY POLICY CAREER

seo.title: Bali Wedding Venues — Bali.Love
seo.description:
Whether you’re looking for Bali’s newest hip destination wedding venue on 
the top of every influencer’s list

children.text: NOW TAKING 2027 BOOKINGS  |  CHAT WITH ONE OF OUR BALI WEDDING PLANNERS TODAY | Contact Us >

Whether you’re looking for Bali’s newest hip destination wedding venue on the top of every influencer’s list (that’s Bali Beach Glamping by the way!), a luxury private villa, or a romantic beachfront garden complete with infinity pool and antique Indonesian statues, you’ll find it here.
Browse our venue listings, or explore our all-inclusive Bali Wedding Packages and let us do all the hard work for you.

The Uluwatu is a premium wedding and event venue located over 3000 square meters of uninterrupted 180-degree ocean views. Situated on a breathtaking clifftop, The Uluwatu has unparalleled views and amenities, making it the perfect luxury property to host your wedding, private event, corporate function or film and photo shoot.With multiple functions spaces The Uluwatu can host small intimate gatherings through to larger events of 100 seated and 120 for a cocktail function.

Sitting on one of the highest points on Uluwatu's famous cliffs, The Edge lives up to its name - the views have to be seen to be believed. Weddings held at The Edge have the option of using different spaces outside different villas depending on the size of the wedding, so it's a good idea to chat to us about your needs and plans so we can work out the best option for you. Whatever you choose, your wedding at The Edge will be the experience of a lifetime that you and your guests will be reminiscing about for years.

A brand new luxury glamping resort is coming to Bali's 5* Nusa Dua South Coast. Sharing the same stunning white sand beaches and tropical turquoise ocean as neighbouring world class resorts The Mulia, Ritz-Carlton and St Regis, Glamp Nusa brings an affordable luxury glamping experience to the most expensive and exclusive destination in Bali. Glamp Nusa offers all-inclusive and exclusive wedding packages for up to 150 guests (seated reception), with accommodation to sleep up to 90 of your guests in the resort's 40 beautifully designed tents with private ensuite bathrooms. Enjoy the stunning clifftop restaurant with full bar and catering packages, infinity pool and a sprawling event lawn with space for garden parties, dance parties, and recovery BBQ brunches. All to the backdrop of a panoramic ocean view. You'll have the resort all to yourself for your wedding, to enjoy with only your nearest and dearest. With no other guests to crash your party, Glamp Nusa is the ultimate VIP resort.

Villa Vedas is truly one of the most unique venues in Bali. Set on metres of beachfront land with eight bedrooms, eight bathrooms and three pools, the architecture and location alone would be enough to make it a sought-after wedding villa. But add to this the fact that its secluded location means there is no curfew and the plans for a new 40-room eco-friendly glamping resort to be completed in 2020, Villa Vedas is set to become Bali's most exciting venue for couples looking for the ultimate party. Surrounded by gorgeous rice paddies and villages, the location north of Tanah Lot is off the beaten track and away from noise and crowding of Bali's main areas, but it's just an easy 20-minute drive from Canggu's bars, shops, restaurants, spas and beach clubs.

Bali Beach Glamping is an amazing beachfront resort that specialises in hosting weddings and other events. The beachfront spans 90meters of uninterrupted private beach. Located just 25 minutes north of Canggu. Host up to 300 guests on the large 1000sqm wedding lawn ideal for weddings, parties, yoga sessions and more. The infinity pool looks out on the Indian Ocean. It’s west facing position makes it the ideal location for taking in a romantic sunset. Other features include a beach club, restaurant and spa. Food, beverage and spa services are offered at reasonable prices to resident guests and visitors. With 40 air-conditioned luxury tents they are able to accommodate 90 guests in total. All luxury tents have ensuite bathrooms. You can book the whole resort exclusively or hire the wedding venue only – the choices are endless and are completely yours to make!

Nestled amongst spacious grounds right on the beach in Canggu, Ombak Luwung is a beautiful luxurious villa - the ideal surrounds for a personal, romantic and memorable wedding! With a generous infinity pool, five bedrooms, jacuzzi and full staff, staying at Ombak Luwung is sure to be the ideal relaxing experience you need in the days before or after your wedding. And, with the best of Canggu's beaches, bars, spas, beach clubs, activities, and restaurants on your doorstep, you and your guests are guaranteed to have the time of your lives!

Set on two and a half acres of clifftop land, Wonderland Uluwatu is a dedicated event venue known for its beautiful views and beautiful gardens - the ideal setting for a perfectly styled boho wedstival or an elegant garden party-style wedding reception. With a glass joglo you're assured protection if it rains while still keeping the outdoor feel of the venue, and the pool set right on the clifftop is the perfect spot for a reception under festoon lights looking out across the ocean.

Puri Temple Hill is a private venue situated in the Jimbaran Hills. Known for its beautiful gardens and Mediterranean-style architecture, Puri Temple Hill offers exceptional privacy and amenity - just like having your wedding at a private villa without the additional cost of a minimum-night stay. Imagine exchanging your vows in the picturesque chapel, then celebrating with some of the best food and drinks in Bali under the gentle glow of festoon lights overhead, surrounded by lush greenery and beautiful water features. With dedicated preparation areas for the bride and groom, a range of indoor and outdoor locations, and the option to extend your curfew to 1am, Puri Temple Hill is truly one of Bali's best wedding venues.

The ultimate beachfront private wedding venue. If you’ve always dreamed of a perfect Bali beach wedding, this is your venue. Taman Bhagawan is set on the white sands of a quiet Nusa Dua beach, surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Protected from the busy outside world by a high brick wall, entering Taman Bhagawan is like discovering a secret garden. Unlike a resort where there may be guests and tourists present during your wedding, as a private venue at Taman Bhagawan you have the entire place all to yourself. While the venue is totally exclusive and private, it’s just down the road from some of Bali’s accommodation, so it’s convenient for you and your guests. With lush gardens, absolute beachfront location and peaceful beach views, stunning Balinese statues and joglos, plus a beautiful pool, Taman Bhagawan is the ultimate beachfront paradise. What’s more, the excellent-value package includes FREE cocktails, delicious food by Vivre Catering and wedding coordination by our trusted wedding planners.

NoKu Beach House is an exquisite Seminyak beachfront wedding destination specifically designed to accommodate the exacting demands of weddings and events. The lawns are large enough to seat 150 people for a formal wedding breakfast, lunch, dinner, while the grounds’ abundant dining and lounge areas can accommodate up to 200 guests for a superb soiree.

Set on a beautiful white sandy beach, the Mulia is a luxury resort that is renowned for romantic beach weddings. Also offering the choice of two chapels, one on a man-made lake and the other facing sea, the Mulia really does cover all bases for your ceremony! Then, when it's time to celebrate, you can choose from holding your reception in the Eternity garden or in one of the Mulia's ballrooms for an indoor event. Famous for their outstanding food and drink, this is an ideal wedding venue for couples with a taste for the finer things in life and an appreciation for quality and luxury.

The famous W Hotel is located on Seminyak's iconic beaches and is at the centre of all the action. With stunning sunset views from the beach, the W Hotel is a popular wedding venue and boasts over 350 square metres of event space. Able to cater for large wedding parties, and with 237 suites, retreats and villas, it's a great choice for couples who want to experience one of Bali's most famous areas and have everyone stay in one spot for the ultimate wedding week.

Khayangan Estate is one of the most unique wedding venues in Bali. Originally designed as a private residence, the level of attention to detail is unparalleled. With its iconic ceremony location on a beautiful lawn overlooking the ocean, fringed by grasses and picturesque timber fencing, Khayangan has become one of Bali's most Instagrammable-wedding venues! The accommodation truly gives you a sense of Balinese and Indonesian traditions, with every space capturing a sense of craftsmanship, from the intricately carved bed canopies and elaborate lattice panelling to a ‘floating’ terrazzo bath with private gardens. With six rooms, arrange into two clusters surrounded by gorgeous tropical gardens, Khayangan Estate combines the best of traditional Bali and contemporary luxury.

One of Bali's most famous and exclusive wedding venues, the Ungasan has hosted many a celebrity wedding and is an incredibly photogenic wedding venue with its Colonial-style white villas, waving palm trees and elevated position overlooking the ocean. The Ungasan offers several options depending on your needs you can choose to book one or more villas. Depending on the number of villas you book, the Ungasan is suitable for weddings of up to 50, 100 or even 150 guests, and gives you the chance to combine your wedding with a memorable stay at one of the world's great luxury resorts.

Situated right on the beautiful white sand beach between Nusa Dua and Tanjung Benoa, The Royal Santrian is a peaceful 5-star resort. With the option for a beach wedding or to use the contemporary white chapel in their grounds for your ceremony, The Royal Santrian offers several options. With extensive tropical gardens and beautiful pools, the Royal Santrian is perfect for couples who want a classic beach wedding and a refined, luxury experience.

Set high on the cliffs overlooking the ocean, Villa Plenilunio is a romantic Mediterranean-inspired private villa. With its beautiful neutral white palette and carved wood, it is a dreamy venue that can transform from a boho paradise to a contemporary elegant wedding depending on your styling. With 10 bedrooms, it's the ultimate place to get together your crew and stay a couple of nights before the wedding unwinding with a swim and a cocktail by the pool.

Stylish accommodation, beautiful sunsets and palm-lined beaches - Alila is the quintessential Bali experience. Get married with the ocean as your backdrop, before celebrating in style under festoon lights with delicious food and drinks. With the option for all your guests to stay at the resort, you can enjoy hanging out with your whole crew in the days before your wedding so you can make the most of having all your favourite people in beautiful Bali with you!

Escape from the hustle and bustle of Bali's busy tourist areas and discover the beautiful east coast. Here you'll find Jeeva Saba, a peaceful private resort villa that has all the charm of old Bali with all the modern creature comforts! Imagine getting married on the beautiful green lawn with the waves crashing in the background, before celebrating into the night at your own private estate. With eight bedrooms, sleeping 16 guests, you can enjoy a few days before and after your wedding hanging out by the pool, walking along the beach or having a blast in the extensive games room!

Set on the top of a cliff, Pandawa Cliff Estate has the benefit of beautiful views and the option to accommodate your guests in 21 bedrooms! Of course, there's no need to book the entire estate if you're planning a smaller wedding, but for couples who have a number of guests who would like to stay on site, Pandawa Cliff Estate offers the seclusion of a private venue with the convenience and luxury of a hotel or resort.

Side by side, two traditional yet contemporary villas share a beautiful view of a quiet stretch of beach. With the option to hire both villas, giving you a total of 11 bedrooms, Seseh Beach Villas are the perfect opportunity to escape into your own private paradise with your closes friends and family and enjoy walks on the beach and lazy days by the pool as you unwind before, or after, the big day! The beautifully landscaped gardens and proximity to the beach make this an incredibly picturesque spot to get married, and the abundance of accommodation is an added bonus.
BALI’S BEST WEDDING PLANNERS, 25+ YEARS COMBINED EXPERIENCE, DIRECT RELATIONSHIPS WITH BALI’S MOST PREMIUM VENUES, CATERERS, PHOTOGRAPHERS & SUPPLIERS.

headings.text: WE HAVE BALI’S best WEDDING VENUES at your FINGERTIPS...

seo.title: Bali Wedding Venue Tours — Bali.Love
seo.description:
Take the uncertainty out of choosing your Bali wedding venue by touring 
your shortlist with a Bali.Love planner.

children.text: NOW TAKING 2027 BOOKINGS  |  CHAT WITH ONE OF OUR BALI WEDDING PLANNERS TODAY | Contact Us >

You’ll be chauffeured by your private driver in air-conditioned comfort to your shortlisted venues accompanied by a Bali.Love wedding planner who can help answer all your questions. Then, if you haven’t already received a quote, we’ll create a personalised, transparent quote for you for each venue, in Australian dollars. You’ll even have the option to organise a food tasting!
Chauffeured in air-conditioned comfort to your shortlisted venues.
Accompanied by a Bali.Love wedding planner who will help to answer all of your questions.
A personalised and transparent quotation for your wedding day.

The day begins when your driver picks you up at the agreed time from vour hotel and takes you out to the venue. Having a private driver means you can avoid the hassle of waiting around for taxis and the taxi potentially not knowing where to take you, and you can also ask the driver to drop you off for lunch and a refreshments along the way. All you need to do is relax in the air-conditioned car while the driver whisks you off to each venue.

You’ll be accompanied on your tour by a Bali.Love wedding planner who will take you through each venue, explain the pros and cons that they’ve learned through experience, and answer any questions you have about the venue, the planning process or Bali in general Our planners are totally impartial – there’s a reason our tours are accompanied by planners, not sales people! A planner’s mission is to give you the best possible wedding experience, so it’s their job to give you honest insights into the venues so you can make an informed decision.

It’s just as important that you feel completely confident in the food you’ll be serving your guests at the wedding as it is to be happy with your venue! A free food tasting at Vivre Catering’s headquarters not only gives you the chance to experience the quality of the food for yourself, but you can also have a tour of the kitchen so you can see the facilities where the food is prepared so you can have complete peaceof mind.

Get in touch and let us know your shortlist, the dates you’ll be in Bali and we’ll get back to you ASAP! And if you don’t quite have a venue shortlist – don’t worry, let us know and we can help with some suggestions.

pages.title: Bali Love Bali's Wedding Planners & Packages — Bali.Love

seo.title: Bali Love Bali's Wedding Planners & Packages — Bali.Love
seo.description:
We're Bali Love. Creating freakin’ amazing weddings is our jam. We love 
Bali. We love love. So, we bring them together and watch the magic happen.

children.text: NOW TAKING 2027 BOOKINGS  |  CHAT WITH ONE OF OUR BALI WEDDING PLANNERS TODAY | Contact Us >
Every member of our team has been involved in Bali weddings in some capacity, whether it’s planning, marketing, catering, or venue management, for years – you could say we’ve seen it all.

From the minute you start researching getting married in Bali, we’re here to help take the hard work out and put the excitement in. Our aim is to make the whole process easy, clear, and fun, so you can relax and enjoy the biggest adventure of your life!
Because there’s nothing more stressful than not knowing exactly what you’re getting, or how much it’ll cost.
We’re in this because we love helping people, and we love being a part of such important celebrations. We give 110% to our clients because we couldn’t work any other wav.
Communication is everything. When you’re planning a huge life event, in another country, you need prompt answers to your question.

We get it. You have a question, but you’re scared to ask for fear you’ll get stuck in a long awkward sales process. We’re not into that. In fact, we only do 100 Bali weddings a year so we can maintain a super high standard.
THE BOSS, OUR FOUNDER

Tom is our straight-talking, fast-talking and brilliant Boss. He might look fancy but he is super grounded… tells bad Dad jokes, and his favourite job ever as a younger person was running the composting toilets at a huge music festival in Australia – literally just organising how best to manage people’s err… sh*t. So many good shit stories apparently…

But in all seriousness, he ran a hugely successful cafe, catering business and wedding business in Melbourne for many years. And now he’s choosing to grow a new wedding company in Bali, so he can escape Melbourne winter every now and then and come for “team meetings” on the beach.
He can’t live without: coffee

His favourite moment of a wedding: The big crescendo at the end when the celebrant announces the couple are now officially married, and there’s this huge emotional release after all the quietness and seriousness of the ceremony, and everyone can just cheer, yell and cry.
Fave food: Cornflakes and honey
SENIOR WEDDING PLANNER

Talitha left her 9-to-5 in Australia’s pharmaceutical industry over 8 years ago to travel the world. After a pitstop in Bali, a chance meeting with a wedding planner, and the courage to say yes, she redirected her epic Project Management skills to organising weddings and the rest is history.

With the attention to detail you’d expect from a seasoned Project Manager, Talitha has every tiny detail covered, twice. And when a couple came to her after their wedding plans fell through, she turned around an entire wedding for 50 guests in two weeks. Imagine what she can do for you in a year…
SENIOR WEDDING PLANNER

Meet Jo, our Wedding Planner that has been more than 15 years in the hospitality industry. She's passionate about music, loves meeting with new people and enjoys working in events; and the wedding world is the amazing place to get all. In fact, before diving into this industry, she was a radio announcer! Jo will be happy to give you tips for your playlist.
He can’t live without: coffee and her rescued dogs.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: When the bride appears, she loves to look at the groom, the family, and also the guests' expressions when they see the bride for the first time.
Fave food: Vegemite, cheese, and Indonesian food.
SENIOR WEDDING PLANNER
Selina is a Bali wedding aficionado with over 12 years of experience on island, dedicated to curating the perfect day for every couple.

As a Senior Wedding Planner and Special Projects Lead, her previous life in retail interior fit-out project management ensures precision and organisation in every detail. When she's in Bali, and not at a wedding, you'll find her enjoying leisurely brunches, exploring the best culinary adventures, tranquil yoga sessions, or chasing after her spirited two-year-old son.
WEDDING PLANNER

Abby is a Planning Specialist with over 13 years of experience working in the event and wedding industry. Starting off as a florist and stylist for some of London's luxury brands Abby's creative flare stemmed and bloomed her career in the Wedding Industry. Owning an Events Management degree and Wedding Planning Diploma, the planning, and logistics of any wedding Abby is involved with are sure to be organised with the finest attention to detail.After panning and styling weddings for venues all over the UK Abby decided to open her wedding wings and relocate to Bali Indonesia to work her magic on the tropical island.
He can’t live without: Nature, music, and her pug Milo.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: When the final details & touches are completed to perfection. Watching the reactions of the couple's faces light up from the transformation fills her with joy!
Fave food: All things veggie & a Sunday roast!.. She is English after all!
OUR VERY OWN BALI LOVE STORY – HUSBAND AND WIFE TEAM – WEDDING PLANNING SPECIALIST ATHA & ACCOUNTS LEAD MARIA

ATHA – With a career dedicated to events, Atha has worked with many of Bali’s venues, food & beverage businesses, and private villa properties. Early in his career at a private villa rental, Atha quickly impressed Wedding Organisers liaising with him for wedding bookings, and soon enough he was poached by one of Bali’s biggest wedding planning companies. We are very very grateful to have his experience on the team

MARIA – Maria comes to Bali Love after years spent working as a Personal Assistant to a children’s clothing brand entrepreneur. She absolutely loves being a Personal Assistant, and becoming that one person that you can trust with anything. With her first class admin skills, she is our team’s Accounting Guru.
PLANNING SPECIALIST
Bagus worked for an international corporate events business for 10 years, and saw them grow from less than 5 employees to hundreds! He is an absolute pro, there is nothing we can’t throw at him.

He loves working at Bali Love because our team has such big heart. He says, “It’s the best feeling in the world to see how happy our couples are on their wedding day. After all the hard work, making people happy is the biggest reward.”
He can’t live without: his family, and helping his community in Lombok where he is from.
His favourite moment of a wedding: when I see the bride and groom smile, so I know we’ve done our job well.
Fave food: everything his wife cooks!
PLANNING SPECIALIST

She’s a natural wedding planner, super organised, an events pro. And her personal passion in life is philosophy, having deep conversations with friends, and reading books about different perspectives on life, searching for life’s great purpose, (or is there a purpose??). Ask Yunita and get stuck into a two hour conversation about it, it’ll be fun! Her deep thinking, listening and heart feeling sensibility means she knows how important all the tiniest of details are for your perfect day.
She can’t live without: Books, and her dog Kuppa!
Her favourite moment of a wedding: Watching the day roll out perfectly, the crescendo of over a year of planning, seeing it become real – “it’s magic”.
Fave food: Nasi goreng (fried rice) with egg – but has to be street style. Not a restaurant nasi goreng… no thanks.
PLANNING SPECIALIST

Dewi is a Planning Specialist with 11 years of experience working in the event and wedding industry. She started as a Wedding Administration staff when she was still studying in university, continuing working as F&B Secretary, and Wedding Coordinator in the hotel, and the last 5 years working alongside the wedding planning team as Vendor Liaison in one of the wedding companies. She uses her positive attitude and tireless energy to encourage others to succeed.
He can’t live without: her sons (Deo & Yoki), her husband, mobile phone, and laptop.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: When the bride & bridesmaid look happy!
Fave food: Western food; especially pasta, pizza, steak. Japanese food. Korean food. She loves food!
ADMIN NINJA

Dewita has worked for 15 years as a personal assistant and Villa Manager. She started to work as a freelancer at weekends to support wedding planning companies when they hire extra staff for wedding days, and she realised that it was the dream job for her. Welcome to the team Dewita, now live out your dream as a full time Wedding Planner – go go!
She can’t live without: relaxing “me time”, travelling and baking.
Her favourite moment of a wedding: watching the bride walk down the aisle with their father – she cries every time.
Fave food: Bakso
PLANNING TEAM

Bram organised events at University and has been working in events ever since he graduated. He is a naturally confident people person, an essential member of your wedding team on the big day, making sure all vendors (and guests!) are where they are meant to be.
He was new to the wedding world when he joined the team, and he never expected it would be more fun than working at nightlife events for an alcohol brand, but he is absolutely loving it!
He can’t live without: Playing guitar, watching movies & TV. He just finished watching You on Netflix and apparently you HAVE to watch it.

His fave moment of a wedding: As a newbie to the world of weddings when he joined the Bali Love team, he absolutely loved the Mother-of-the-bride speech at his first Bali Love wedding. It made him so emotional, which he didn’t expect at all.
Fave food: nasi goreng with omelette
ADMIN SPECIALIST

Diah is an Admin Specialist, and enjoys using her product management skill to contribute to the catalogue at Bali.Love. Having experienced helping a friend's wedding company, she is happy to be part of the wedding industry. Besides being responsible for the catalogue, she is also arranging the tour. So much fun!
He can’t live without: EAT
Her favourite moment of a wedding: Wedding vows is the romantic moment!
Fave food: Meat & meat processed product - meat ball, steak, sausage, hamburger.
PLANNING TEAM

Before life at Bali Love, Ary worked in live music events, organising rock music events for Malboro and other brands, in venues all over Bali. Fun fact – He was also a vocalist in a hardcore band when he was younger! Ask Ary for local rock band recommendations if you want a wedding band that’s a little more punk, less pop…

He can’t live without: travelling. “My favourite trip ever was to this tiny island south of Lombok, I don’t remember the name of it (we don’t believe him for a minute!), but only groups of 5 people are allowed to go there, and it’s amazing.”
His favourite moment of a wedding: when the couple exchange their rings and kiss. It’s so romantic.
Fave food: nasi goreng or any local food
BALI’S BEST WEDDING PLANNERS, 25+ YEARS COMBINED EXPERIENCE, DIRECT RELATIONSHIPS WITH BALI’S MOST PREMIUM VENUES, CATERERS, PHOTOGRAPHERS & SUPPLIERS.

pages.title: All-Inclusive Bali Wedding Packages - Wedding Planners

seo.title: All-Inclusive Bali Wedding Packages - Wedding Planners
seo.description:
Our Bali wedding planners have over 30 years experience curating beautiful 
all-inclusive wedding packages in Bali’s most breathtaking wedding venues.

hero.headline: CELEBRATING LOVEin the BEAUTIFULISLAND of  BALI​
hero.subheadline: NOW TAKING 2027 BOOKINGS  |  CHAT WITH ONE OF OUR BALI WEDDING PLANNERS TODAY | Contact Us >

children.text: NOW TAKING 2027 BOOKINGS  |  CHAT WITH ONE OF OUR BALI WEDDING PLANNERS TODAY | Contact Us >
Beautifully curated, high-quality Bali wedding packages and Bali wedding planning, in Bali’s most breathtaking wedding venues.

We live and breathe weddings, and our planners are physically here living and breathing Bali life. Exactly where you need your A-team to be to help you plan your dream Bali Wedding. With over 40 years combined experience in weddings, events and travel, our team have incredible relationships with Bali’s finest suppliers, giving you the option of bespoke planning services, or an all inclusive Bali wedding package.

Transparent, flexible detailed Bali wedding packages for Bali’s best wedding venues. Wedding packages take the stress out of booking your wedding so you know exactly what you’re getting and how much it costs.
EXPLORE PACKAGES →

Your wedding planner is your team leader, your boots on the ground, your organisational ninja and vour emotional support all in one. Bali.Love offers a variety different Bali wedding planning services.
EXPLORE PLANNING →
Our team has spent years building solid relationships with Bali’s most stunning wedding venues. Let us take care of everything, and you can focus on more important things, like dress shopping…
EXPLORE VENUES →

With Bali.Love wedding planning, you get your own dedicated Bali wedding planner to take care of the important tasks and to guide you through the process, plus the benefit of the entire extended planning and operational team.
So, take a big breath in, and let it all go – it’s time to stop stressing, and start planning.
We’re glad you asked!

Planning a destination wedding can feel like it involves a million different tasks and answering questions you’ve never considered before, and it easily becomes overwhelming. But with the right support, the process becomes clear.

Think about it – most likely, the maximum number of weddings you’ve ever planned hovers somewhere in the realm of zero. Contrast that with the Bali.Love planning team whose decades of experience equates to thousands of weddings planned. We’ve got this!
Get the benefit of experience on your side.

Aside from saving your sanity, there’s a strong practical reason to engage a planner – in any given wedding, there are dozens of suppliers who must be booked and coordinated for everything to go smoothly. While this is a piece of cake to a planner who knows all the suppliers individually, for a couple in another country it’s hard to know when vou need to book kev suppliers (and there’s nothing worse than suddenly realising all the good photographers are alreadv booked out for vour wedding date). Plus. simply sending off deposits overseas and hoping for the best generally isn’t a recipe for a stress-free planning experience!

We cannot express how much gratitude we have for the Bali Love team, for delivering the most magical day of our lives… If you are considering a destination wedding in Bali, then Bali Love are your team! We are still in are of how seamless and perfect our day was…they worked tirelessly to bring to life every single detail of our vision in the most spectacular ways. They are the most warm and accommodating team who truly took all the stress out of the process, from concept to execution. Their experience, expertise and network of the very best suppliers meant that we were able to have the wedding day of our dreams! Thank you Bali Love, you are the very best at what you do and we are eternally grateful.
– PENELOPE AND DAVID
Because there’s nothing more stressful than not knowing exactly what you’re getting, or how much it’ll cost.
We’re in this because we love helping people, and we love being a part of such important celebrations. We give 110% to our clients because we couldn’t work any other wav.
Communication is everything. When you’re planning a huge life event, in another country, you need prompt answers to your question.

We get it. You have a question, but you’re scared to ask for fear you’ll get stuck in a long awkward sales process. We’re not into that. In fact, we only do 100 Bali weddings a year so we can maintain a super high standard.

Whether you’re looking for Bali’s newest hip destination wedding venue on the top of every influencer’s list (that’s Bali Beach Glamping by the way!), a luxury private villa, or a romantic beachfront garden complete with infinity pool and antique Indonesian statues, you’ll find it here.
Browse our venue listings, or explore our all-inclusive Bali Wedding Packages and let us do all the hard work for you.

A brand new luxury glamping resort is coming to Bali's 5* Nusa Dua South Coast. Sharing the same stunning white sand beaches and tropical turquoise ocean as neighbouring world class resorts The Mulia, Ritz-Carlton and St Regis, Glamp Nusa brings an affordable luxury glamping experience to the most expensive and exclusive destination in Bali. Glamp Nusa offers all-inclusive and exclusive wedding packages for up to 150 guests (seated reception), with accommodation to sleep up to 90 of your guests in the resort's 40 beautifully designed tents with private ensuite bathrooms. Enjoy the stunning clifftop restaurant with full bar and catering packages, infinity pool and a sprawling event lawn with space for garden parties, dance parties, and recovery BBQ brunches. All to the backdrop of a panoramic ocean view. You'll have the resort all to yourself for your wedding, to enjoy with only your nearest and dearest. With no other guests to crash your party, Glamp Nusa is the ultimate VIP resort.

Bali Beach Glamping is an amazing beachfront resort that specialises in hosting weddings and other events. The beachfront spans 90meters of uninterrupted private beach. Located just 25 minutes north of Canggu. Host up to 300 guests on the large 1000sqm wedding lawn ideal for weddings, parties, yoga sessions and more. The infinity pool looks out on the Indian Ocean. It’s west facing position makes it the ideal location for taking in a romantic sunset. Other features include a beach club, restaurant and spa. Food, beverage and spa services are offered at reasonable prices to resident guests and visitors. With 40 air-conditioned luxury tents they are able to accommodate 90 guests in total. All luxury tents have ensuite bathrooms. You can book the whole resort exclusively or hire the wedding venue only – the choices are endless and are completely yours to make!

Villa Vedas is the ultimate luxury private villa. Set on 45 metres of beachfront, the villa has been architect-design with no expense spared or detail forgotten. Relax and unwind before your wedding in total luxury, swim in the infinity pool or sky plunge pool, walk along the beach or order a massage. Your wedding day will be the best party you’ll ever throw at Villa Vedas with a 2am curfew! Congratulations, you’ve just found Bali’s best value 5-star private villa wedding. Surrounded by gorgeous rice paddies and villages, the location north of Tanah Lot is off the beaten track and away from noise and crowding of Bali's main areas, but it's just an easy 20-minute drive from Canggu's bars, shops, restaurants, spas and beach clubs.

Sitting on one of the highest points on Uluwatu's famous cliffs, The Edge lives up to its name - the views have to be seen to be believed. Weddings held at The Edge have the option of using different spaces outside different villas depending on the size of the wedding, so it's a good idea to chat to us about your needs and plans so we can work out the best option for you. Whatever you choose, your wedding at The Edge will be the experience of a lifetime that you and your guests will be reminiscing about for years.
Nobody sings our praises quite like our happy couples. Go check out any Bali Wedding Facebook or community forums online and ask about us. We’ll let them speak for us.

At Bali.Love, what you see is what you get. There’s nothing worse than getting a shock at the price right at the very end. In Bali, it’s normal for you to see one price but then be charged another higher price with added taxes and service charges. We promise that all our advertised prices include all applicable fees and charges, so there are no nasty surprises.

As an Australian-owned company, Bali. Love is bound by Australian Consumer Law. Consumer Law is much stronger in Australia than in other parts of the world, so it’s important to make sure that vou’re booking through a reputable companv that gives vou the maximum consumer protection. We work reallv hard to maintain exceptional relationships and we get industry rates for everything. We love to make sure our clients are getting the best deal.
Contact us directly at…
